Calling for the immediate release of Cuban democracy activist JosÃ© Daniel Ferrer and commending the efforts of JosÃ© Daniel Ferrer to promote human rights and fundamental freedoms in Cuba.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution condemns the imprisonment of Cuban democracy and human rights activist Jose Daniel Ferrer and calls for the release of Ferrer and all members of the Patriotic Union of Cuba (UNPACU). The resolution further commends Ferrer and recognizes the contributions of UNPACU for advancing human rights and fundamental freedoms in Cuba.
